medi:segment.name: Beginning of message
medi:segment.medi:documentation: BGM, A segment indicating the beginning of a message and identifying the consignment for which status is being reported.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment indicating the date of the message.

medi:segment.name: Transport service requirements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TSR, A segment identifying the transport service relating to the consignment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments to specify a party and its associated contacts with communication numbers.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment identifying a party to the consignment such as shipper or consignee.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments to identify a contact and its communications related to the party.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment to specify a contact name associated with the party.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to specify a communication number related to the contact.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 3: To relate a date/time to a reference, such as date of shipment reference number.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying a reference which applies to the entire consignment.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, To relate a date/time to a reference, such as date of shipment reference number.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment identifying a place/location which applies to the consignment such as consignment origin and destination.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment specifying free form or processable supplementary or other information.

medi:segment.name: Control total
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CNT, A segment specifying a total for the consignment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 4: SG7-SG8-SG10-SG12-SG13 A group of segments to identify a piece of transport equipment and status details relating to it.

medi:segment.name: Equipment details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQD, A segment identifying equipment related to status or event such as a container of a multi-container consignment.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment identifying parties linked to a transport equipment such as the transport equipment owner, transport equipment operator/lessee or manufacturer of the transport equipment etc.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment indicating the date and time of the preceding transport equipment, e.g. manufacturing, inspection and etc.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment specifying free form or processable supplementary or other information such as the state of the transport equipment.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment specifying measurements related to the equipment such as gross weight, tare weight, capacity.

medi:segment.name: Dimensions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DIM, A segment specifying the dimensions of the equipment such as height.

medi:segment.name: Seal number
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SEL, A segment identifying seal and seal issuer associated with the equipment.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to specify a reference number to equipment.

medi:segment.name: Transport placement
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TPL, A segment to identify the means of transport to which the equipment is inked, necessary in cases where this forms the key to retrieve relevant information.

medi:segment.name: Transport movement details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TMD, A segment to specify transport movement details related to the equipment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments to specify dangerous goods regulations.

medi:segment.name: Dangerous goods
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DGS, A segment to indicate the dangerous goods regulations which apply, the class of the dangerous goods, additional dangerous goods codes, the United Nations Dangerous Goods (UNDG) number and the shipment flash point.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to specify supplementary details regarding the dangerous goods such as dangerous goods technical name and other additional information

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments indicating locations related to the transport equipment.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment indicating locations related to the transport equipment.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to specify dates and times related to a location.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 7: A group of segments indicating the status and/or identifying an event and specifying relevant details related to a piece of transport equipment.

medi:segment.name: Status
medi:segment.medi:documentation: STS, A segment specifying the status relating to the transport equipment.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment identifying the location at which the status or event occurs.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment indicating the date and time of the status or event.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 8: A group of segments specifying the attached equipment and the associated information.

medi:segment.name: Attached equipment
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQA, A segment identifying attached equipment or related equipment such as a chassis attached to a container.

medi:segment.name: Seal number
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SEL, A segment identifying seal and seal issuer associated with the equipment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 9: A group of segments indicating locations related to the attached equipment.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment indicating locations related to the attached equipment.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to specify dates and times related to a location.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 10: A group of segments indicating conveyance details related to the status or event.

medi:segment.name: Transport information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TDT, A segment identifying conveyance related to the status or event such as flight, vessel/voyage.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment indicating date(s) and and time(s) related to the conveyance such as arrival date and time.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment specifying an additional reference related to the conveyance such as transfer manifest number, truck license number.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 11: A group of segments indicating locations related to the means of transport.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment indicating locations related to conveyance such as flight origin/destination.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to specify dates and times related to a location.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 12: A group of segments to specify temperature relating to the equipment.

medi:segment.name: Temperature
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TMP, A segment to specify temperature relating to the equipment.

medi:segment.name: Range details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RNG, A segment to specify a temperature range which relates to the temperature.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 13: A group of segments to specify damage relating to the equipment.

medi:segment.name: Damage
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DAM, A segment to specify damage relating to a preceding EQD segment.

medi:segment.name: Component details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COD, A segment to specify component details which relate to the damaged equipment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 14: A group of segments to identify a consignment and status details relating to it.

medi:segment.name: Consignment information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CNI, A segment to identify a consignment for which status details are given.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to indicate a location relating to the consignment, such as place/port of origin, place/port of destination.

medi:segment.name: Control total
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CNT, A segment to provide a control total for the consignment, such as total number of pieces, total weight.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 15: SG21-SG25 A group of segments indicating the status and/or identifying an event and specifying relevant details.

medi:segment.name: Status
medi:segment.medi:documentation: STS, A segment specifying the status relating to a consignment (e.g. loaded).

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying a reference relating to the status (e.g House Bill of Lading number).

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment indicating the date and time of the status or event.

medi:segment.name: Document/message details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DOC, A segment to specify document details related to the status code, such as indication which document is missing (status code: document missing).

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment specifying a monetary amount relating to the status.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 16: A group of segments that refers through an external file identification to each of the external files and giving additional information about each of the files.

medi:segment.name: External file link identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EFI, This segment will identify the external files by indicating the file name, file number and its sequence number in an exchange.

medi:segment.name: Computer environment details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CED, To give precise definitions of all necessary elements belonging to the configuration of a computer system, e.g. hardware, firmware, operating system, communication and application software.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, To identify a communication number of a department or a person to whom communication should be directed.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment giving reference related to the file identified by a previous external file link identification segment.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, This segment will convey the date/time details of the external file.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, The size/volume of the external file identified in the previous external file link identification segment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 17: A group of segments to identify a party and contact details associated with the event.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment specifying the name and/or address associated with the event such as notify party, terminal address, trucking company for gate move.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 18: A group of segments identifying a contact to whom communication regarding the status event can be directed.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or department.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to identify a communication number of a person or department.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment identifying the location at which the status or event occurs.

medi:segment.name: Package identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCI, A segment to specify individual packages (transportable units) relating to the consignment status.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 19: A group of segments indicating conveyance details related to the status or event.

medi:segment.name: Transport information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TDT, A segment identifying conveyance related to the status or event such as flight, vessel/voyage.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment indicating date(s) and time(s) related to the conveyance such as arrival date and time.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment specifying an additional reference related to the conveyance such as transfer manifest number, truck license number.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 20: A group of segments indicating locations related to the means of transport.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment indicating locations related to conveyance such as flight origin/destination.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to specify dates and times related to a location.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 21: A group of segments indicating the equipment details relating to the status or event.

medi:segment.name: Equipment details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQD, A segment identifying equipment related to status or event such as a container of a multi-container consignment.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment specifying measurements related to the equipment such as gross weight, tare weight, capacity.

medi:segment.name: Dimensions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DIM, A segment specifying the dimensions of the equipment such as height.

medi:segment.name: Seal number
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SEL, A segment identifying seal and seal issuer associated with the equipment.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to specify a reference number to equipment.

medi:segment.name: Transport placement
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TPL, A segment to identify the means of transport to which the equipment is linked, necessary in cases where this forms the key to retrieve relevant information.

medi:segment.name: Transport movement details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TMD, A segment to specify transport movement details related to the equipment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 22: A group of segments indicating locations related to the transport equipment.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment indicating locations related to the transport equipment.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to specify dates and times related to a location.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 23: A group of segments specifying the attached equipment and the associated information.

medi:segment.name: Attached equipment
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQA, A segment identifying attached equipment or related equipment such as a chassis attached to a container.

medi:segment.name: Seal number
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SEL, A segment identifying seal and seal issuer associated with the equipment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 24: A group of segments indicating locations related to the attached equipment.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment indicating locations related to the attached equipment.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to specify dates and times related to a location.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 25: SG28-SG29 A group of segments describing the goods item related to the status or event.

medi:segment.name: Goods item details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GID, A segment identifying a goods item.

medi:segment.name: Handling instructions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: HAN, A segment identifying handling instructions.

medi:segment.name: Split goods placement
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SGP, A segment to identify equipment in which (part of) a goods item is transported.

medi:segment.name: Dangerous goods
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DGS, A segment to specify dangerous goods details related to the goods item.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to describe the goods item, and to provide additional free text information related to the goods item.

medi:segment.name: Nature of cargo
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GDS, A segment to identify the type of cargo.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to identify a location related to the goods.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment to identify a quantity.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 26: A group of segments specifying measurements.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment specifying measurements, other than dimension, of a goods item.

medi:segment.name: Number of units
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQN, A segment specifying the number of units to which the given measurement is applicable.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 27: A group of segments specifying dimensions of a goods item.

medi:segment.name: Dimensions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DIM, A segment specifying dimensions of a goods item.

medi:segment.name: Number of units
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQN, A segment specifying the number of units to which the given dimension is applicable.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 28: A group of segments specifying the references of the goods related to the status or event.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to identify a reference related to the goods.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to specify a date/time related to the reference.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 29: A group of segments specifying marks and numbers related to the transport line items.

medi:segment.name: Package identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCI, A segment specifying marks related to the transport line items.

medi:segment.name: Goods identity number
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GIN, A segment specifying identity numbers related to the transport line items.
